snippet: Serena Williams lost in straight sets to Angelique Kerber, dropping her first match since May, while her sister Venus advanced to the semifinals at the Western & Southern Open.
abstract: Serena Williams loses to Angelique Kerber in the quarterfinals, while her sister Venus beats Samantha Stosur to advance to the semifinals at the Western & Southern Open.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams lost in straight sets to Angelique Kerber, dropping her first match since May, while her sister Venus advanced to the semifinals at the Western & Southern Open.

headline.seo: Serena Williams Upset at Western & Southern Open as Venus Advances
headline.main: For Williams Sisters, a Split in Cincinnati
headline.print_headline: Williams Sisters Split in Cincinnati, Ending One Streak and Another Drought
